properties.name: application
properties.description: Root configuration properties for the application.

properties.name: application.jwt
properties.description: Configuration properties for JWT (JSON Web Token) settings.

properties.name: application.jwt.refresh-expiration-ms
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT refresh tokens in milliseconds.

properties.name: application.jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT tokens in milliseconds.

properties.name: application.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens.
